Reviews.Title: maybe my camera is defective?
Reviews.Author: adam52604
Reviews.Content: I have a Q-see dvr recorder I purchased at costco that has 4 cameras.  1 camera broke and I bought this as a replacement.  This camera is far worse than the others included.  THe night vision is terrible I can hardly even make out the figure of my truck much less even identify a person.  The camera works ok during the day but the colors are all way off.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: jmaywho
Reviews.Content: This camera is better than the first ones. The picture is much better and clearer. This is worth the money...

Reviews.Title: Working very well
Reviews.Author: Rick1971
Reviews.Content: I have had them for a time now and they are holding up well, picture it pretty clear considering the price, the night vision is OKbut the camera does a great job if i turn on the porch lightsi say this was a good buy

Reviews.Title: Nice starter camera
Reviews.Author: gadget guy
Reviews.Content: I have two video reviews for this camera and the drv package it comes with as well. Check out my utube channel by searching for dfizzbom and you'll find the vids. One is a mounting hack to help make mounting this camera more flexible, and one video covers how these cameras actually look in remote viewing. Be sure to check those vids out and I hope they help you.So far, I like these cameras. Eight of them came bundled with a q-see dvr package I picked up about a month ago. The cameras installed well and are still going strong. We've had seriously hot temps, fog, rain, and even storms and all is well. It is recommended you install these cameras under eves if possible. The more protected they are from direct weather on them, they better they'll fair in the long run. Daytime views are very accetable and the night vision is what you would expect- a bit grainy. But added outdoor lighting on the area helps clean the view right up. I recommend you not rely soley on this cameras IR ability in total outdoor darkness. For the best picture- add light. It cleans right up. But, 24 IR leds is actually decent too, so this camera will see in total darkness, albeit it grainy. Indoors in total darkness such as a stock room, the night vision is actually really good and not noisy. The bigger the space in total darkness, the more grainy the picture will be. Also, wrap weather proof electrical tape around the connection outdoors. That's a good habit to practice when installing any camera. Remember to check out my vids. A picture is worth a thousand words! There are better cameras to be had, but this one will perform well. At least it has for me and I have five currently installed.

Reviews.Title: Okay For the Price
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I bought the 8 camera set and everything worked when I first set them up. One week later, one of the cameras stopped working. I will update again when the next camera fails. For the price, these a good cameras for basic surveillance. Unless you have very good camera positioning, you can only identify people you already know from 5 to 10 ft away.

Reviews.Title: Great but pricey,
Reviews.Author: Emmalovestokyo
Reviews.Content: Its a great camera and were planning on purchasing another one to complete the 4 camera ensemble. It also holds well with the weather. Weve had it for over a year during sunshine, heat, cold, and rain...still working fine.

Reviews.Title: Took a dump after two weeks.
Reviews.Author: David W.
Reviews.Content: Nice looking camera, easy to install, bought it to replace a camera from the same company that had gotten damaged. Worked fantastic for two weeks, then it pooped out. Very disappointing. Amazon was great and refunded my money. I was going to get another one thinking it was probably just a fluke and the price had increased over $10.00. Now I have no camera.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Doris F Webb
Reviews.Content: This came with a missing part so I returned it and didn't bother with another one. Wasn't that impressed with it.

Reviews.Title: Inexppensive and adequate
Reviews.Author: S. A. Thal
Reviews.Content: If you want hi def. this is not your camera but very adequate and good in low light. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Little Red
Reviews.Content: We had to replace one camera of our security system as one of them did not work.  We have had it stored away for about a year before my husband could get it installed on our home and I guess one of them just was defective as all the others worked just fine.  This new one works fine also.  We are pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: John 3:16
Reviews.Content: Camera is a good purchase for the price and it matches my Q-See system, I have 3 and they are all working just fine.Cons: Color is not 100% accurate and night vision is poor, although it does capture motion pretty good.

Reviews.Title: q-see
Reviews.Author: Planker
Reviews.Content: great quality, works just like it said it would, shipped the next day, Great price compared to on line stores. During the day its a great camera but at night everything turns pink and cant really tell whats what. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Gary T Mund
Reviews.Content: Did not work, all ready have 8 cameras set up and work great. Was to be added on but did not work, bad out of the box

Reviews.Title: Q-see wide angle camera
Reviews.Author: Cheechibean
Reviews.Content: This camera is a drag the picture is unclear and at night which it claims to have is blurry making it useless

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Derek F. Safley
Reviews.Content: Product is as described in the ad, new, came with in original retail package, mounting screws, cables, power adapter, works well, arrived earlier than expected.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: R. Oakes "Databox"
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for one of my old cameras. I guess it depends what you want it for ... but I use these for watching outside my house on a Q-See recorder. It's not of a quality for making movies or something ... but for what I use it for it's great. My only gripe is it only has lateral left/right adjustment, ie, you can's turn the lens left/right to allow for angled mounting such as on a roof eve ... at least I haven't found a way ... that's why the 4 Star rating. Other than that ... the picture is good.

Reviews.Title: Q see is worthless
Reviews.Author: Jamie Maxx
Reviews.Content: I got a Q see 16 cam system and all the cameras were narrow angle and crappy resolution despite 700 lines they said..... I also got a defective pan tilt zoom cam in the deal and sent it back to have it fixed and they basically said "prove you bought it from us through Costco!!".... They never have returned the cam and Costco no long carries their crap Oh yea and tech support is zero I never got it online to work through my smart phone.....I hope they piss of Obama and Al Quaida!!!!! don't buy there crap!!!

Reviews.Title: Decent but not great day image; non-existent night image
Reviews.Author: dincon2000
Reviews.Content: This unit does not provide a great daytime image but it is OK.  Unfortunately, the night vision is non-existent.  The LEDs do come on but there is no discernable image.  One camera is mounted on my patio facing my house.  There is a table and chair set within 8 feet, a bargecue grill within 12, more chairs at 15-18 and then sliding glass doors into the family room. The only thing visible at night is light in the family room but nothing, not furniture or people or even the light source itself, is discernable.  I've got a low lux camera that does much better without any IR illumintation. I give it two stars only because the daytime picture works.

Reviews.Title: Blurry Camera
Reviews.Author: MasterB
Reviews.Content: Bought this to add on my Q-see security camera system.The picture was bad compare to  my other 8.Have you ever watch a liquor store robbery video on TV and you cant make out the persons face? Well this is what you will be buying.Save your money and buy a higher quality camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Compatible with any Q-See DVR
Weatherproof for indoor or outdoor use
Up to 40 ft. of Night Vision
400 TV Lines Resolution
Includes cable, stand, and power supply
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QSM1424W Wide Angle Indoor and Outdoor Security Camera
